text: Massacre at Marble City (; ; ) is a 1964 German French Italian western movie directed by Paul Martin and is loosely based on the 1845 novel Die Regulatoren von Arkansas by Friedrich Gerst√§cker. It stars Brad Harris, Mario Adorf, Horst Frank, Ralf Wolter, Dorothee Parker and was distributed by Constantin Film. == Other websites == * Category:1964 movies Category:1960s Western (genre) movies Category:German Western (genre) movies Category:French Western (genre) movies Category:Italian Western (genre) movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Paul Martin
